Sources and Thanks
===========================

We sincerely thank our professors Benjamin Charlier and Joseph Salmon for their great teaching. 
We also thank Tanguy Lefort whose help was essential to the handling of this project.


All these links were very usefull for the occpollution development:

- The project statement: https://github.com/bcharlier/HMMA238/blob/master/Projects/Project_Occitanie_polution.md
- The Github page of the scientific software development course: https://github.com/bcharlier/HMMA238
- The website where we get Occitanie data: http://data-atmo-occitanie.opendata.arcgis.com/datasets/4a648b54876f485e92f22e2ad5a5da32_0
- The website where we get Paris data: https://www.airparif.asso.fr/en/telechargement/telechargement-station
- A good illustration of how to build a map under folium: https://nordicesmhub.github.io/deep_python/14-publish/index.html
- A good explanation of the ANOVA part of our project: http://josephsalmon.eu/HMMA307.html
